name: Add or update Mailchimp subscribers from Webflow site submissions
description: Effortlessly manage your email marketing strategy by connecting Webflow and Mailchimp. With this template, every time a new site is created or updated in Webflow, Make will automatically add or update the corresponding subscriber in your Mailchimp list. This ensures that your email campaigns are always targeting the right audience, enhancing your engagement and conversion rates. Streamline your workflow and keep your subscriber list up-to-date without any manual effort.
